## Reference values

```{r us_nl, include=FALSE}
us_nl <- list(
  thyroid = "< 3 x 2 x 6 cm (AP x TV x Long)",
  bladder = "
* < 0.8 cm (Collapse)
* < 0.4 cm (Distend)
",
  uterus = "
* Size < 5 x 4 x 8 cm (AP x TV x Long)
* ETT
    * < 1.5 cm
    * < 0.5 cm (post-menstrual)
",
  prostate = "
* < 25 ml (Normal)
* 25 - 40 ml (Prominent)
* \\> 40 ml (BPH)
",
  kidneys = "
Normal
* Long < 10 - 12 cm
* Cortical thickness > 1 cm

Abnormal
* Long < 8 cm (kidney disease)
",
  spleen = "
* < 12 cm (Normal)
* 12 - 15 cm (Mild splenomegaly)
* \\> 15 cm (Mark splenomegaly)
",
  veins = "
* Splenic v. < 11 cm
* SMV < 12 cm
* Portal v. < 13 cm
",
  aorta = "
Normal
* < 2.5 cm (Upper)
* < 2 cm (Lower)

Abnormal

* \\> 3 cm (Aneurysm)
",
  gb = "

* TV < 4 cm

",

"
)
```

```{r us_nl_tbl}
us_nl_tbl <- dplyr::tribble(
  ~Organs, ~`Reference Range`,
  # KUB
  "Kidneys", us_nl$kidneys,
  "Urinary Bladder (wall)", us_nl$bladder,
  "Residual Urine", "< 100 ml", 
  # Repro
  "Uterus", us_nl$uterus, 
  "Prostate", us_nl$prostate, 
  # Liver & GB
  "Gallbladder", us_nl$gb,
  "CBD", us_nl$cbd,
  # Vessel
  "Veins", us_nl$veins,
  "Aorta",  us_nl$aorta, 
  "Spleen", us_nl$spleen, 
  "Thyroid", us_nl$thyroid
) 

render_gt_us_nl_tbl <- function() {
  us_nl_tbl %>% 
  gt(rowname_col = "Organs") %>%
  fmt_markdown(columns = everything()) %>% 
  # Row Groups
  tab_row_group(
    label = "Vessel",
    rows = 8:9
  ) %>% 
  tab_row_group(
    label = "HBP",
    rows = 6:7
  ) %>% 
  tab_row_group(
    label = "Repro",
    rows = 4:5
  ) %>% 
  tab_row_group(
    label = "KUB", 
    rows = 1:3
    ) %>% 
  # FootNote
  tab_footnote("AP = Anteroposterior, TV = Transverse, Long = Longitudinal") %>% 
  # Style: Row Group
  tab_style(
    style = cell_text(weight = "bold", size = 20),
    locations = cells_row_groups()
  ) %>% 
  # Style: Column Labels
  tab_style(
    style = list(cell_text(weight = "bold", size = 20), 
                 cell_fill(color = "lightgrey")),
    locations = cells_column_labels()
  ) %>% 
  # Style: Stub
  tab_style(
    style = cell_text(weight = "bold" , size = 20),
    locations = cells_stub()
  ) %>% 
  # Style: Cell Body
  tab_style(
    style = cell_text(size = 20),
    locations = cells_body()
  ) %>% 
  tab_options(table.width = pct(90))
}

## Show for HTML only
if(knitr::is_html_output()) {
  render_gt_us_nl_tbl()
}
```
